fastapi.title: PDF Upload API
fastapi.description: FastAPI application with database and Redis connection

pdf.default_prompt: How many pages are in this file?
pdf.user_input_required: User input is required to continue the chat.
pdf.file_not_found: File not found in Redis. Please upload the file first.
pdf.chat_ended: Records associated with chat and file {file_name} have been cleared and chat history has been saved.
